name: Apu and the Blue Lotus
description: For Sharadiya Game Jam 2k19.  A 2D platformer game, which takes you to the adventures of Apu, a young atheist boy from Katwa, who chances upon an age old Sacred temple,  and the Lady Almighty Maa Durga herself. When he finds out that the world's fate rests in his hands, he bravely takes up the challenge and ventures forth in the Grand Parikshit temple. Little does he know what lies ahead.
